name: searchengine

params.description: control options
params.name: options

params.description: API key, mandatory if autoconf service has not been charged in advance
params.name: options.apiKey

params.description: use of ssl or not (default true, service requested using https protocol)
params.name: options.ssl

params.description: collapse mode, true by default
params.name: options.collapsed
options.zoomTo

params.description: Placeholder in search bar. Default is "Rechercher un lieu, une adresse".
params.name: options.placeholder

params.description: set a marker on search result, defaults to true.
params.name: options.displayMarker

params.description: Marker style. Currently possible values are "lightOrange" (default value), "darkOrange", "red" and "turquoiseBlue".
params.name: options.markerStyle

params.description: False to disable advanced search tools (it will not be displayed). Default is true (displayed)
params.name: options.displayAdvancedSearch

params.description: advanced search options for geocoding (filters). Properties can be found among geocode options.filterOptions (see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~geocode Gp.Services.geocode})
params.name: options.advancedSearch

params.description: resources to be used by geocode and autocompletion services :
params.name: options.resources

params.description: resources geocoding, by default : ["PositionOfInterest", "StreetAddress"]
params.name: options.resources.geocode

params.description: resources autocompletion, by default : ["PositionOfInterest", "StreetAddress"]
params.name: options.resources.autocomplete

params.description: options of geocode service
params.name: options.geocodeOptions

params.description: to overload the check of rights (only) on the given apiKey for the geocode service
params.name: options.geocodeOptions.apiKey

params.description: filteroptions of the geocode service
params.name: options.geocodeOptions.filterOptions

params.description: to overload the check of rights (only) on the given type of resources used by the geocode service.
params.name: options.geocodeOptions.filterOptions.type

params.description: overload other options : options of geocode service from the access-lib API (see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~geocode Gp.Services.geocode})
params.name: options.geocodeOptions.serviceOptions

params.description: options of autocomplete service
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions

params.description: to overload the check of rights (only) on the given apiKey for the the autocomplete service
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.apiKey

params.description: filteroptions of the autocomplete service
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.filterOptions

params.description: to overload the check of rights (only) on the given type of resources used by the autocomplete service
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.filterOptions.type

params.description: overload other options : options of autocomplete service from the access-lib API (see {@link http://ignf.github.io/geoportal-access-lib/latest/jsdoc/module-Services.html#~autoComplete Gp.Services.autoComplete})
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.serviceOptions

params.description: trigger a geocoding request if the autocompletion does not return any suggestions, false by default
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.triggerGeocode

params.description: waiting time before sending the geocoding request, 1000ms by default
params.name: options.autocompleteOptions.triggerDelay
